It only makes sense that we want to help you grow too by offering home loan packages that will help you buy into that dream home you’ve always dreamed of. Fixed Rate Loans (3 Years)

(owner occupied) // Loan 3 Falcon Bank Flexibility has been a paramount facet when establishing Falcon as we believe we should treat our customers with the respect and trust that they deserve. Which is why we have created competitive home loan packages that promote ease and no-nonsense when getting buying into your new home. Fixed Rate Loans (3 Years)
3.89% p.a. variable rate // Lawyers // Lawyer 1 Hienaman And Partners With over 150 years of providing the community competitive legal advice at matching rates, it’s no wonder we are the number 1 law firm when it comes to topics pertaining to Real Estate, whether it be inspecting purchasing, leasing, and renting contracts, or construction law. We will investigate, and provide you advice on what to do with your property, new or old, and only work to your best interest - because it’s ours too. Rates
Lawyers - Between $350 and $650 per hour
Solicitors - $150 and $250 per hour // Lawyer 2 The Golden Mile Legal Solutions Nothing feels better than getting your legal life sorted out. We specialize in giving our customers that feeling, and we’ve now branched out to Real-Estate and we’re giving Flagg users a glimpse in how real-estate legal should be done. Rates
Lawyers - between $300 and $500 per hour
